mapper.select: SELECT cl.id,cl.link_id,cl.from_user_id,cl.to_user_id,cl.unread_count,u.nickname,u.avatar_url, (SELECT content FROM chat_message cm WHERE cl.link_id=cm.link_id AND cm.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) last_message, (SELECT create_time FROM chat_message cm WHERE cl.link_id=cm.link_id AND cm.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) create_time FROM chat_list cl LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = cl.from_user_id WHERE cl.to_user_id = #{userId} AND cl.is_deleted=0 AND u.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
